objects.text: • Complete Ecosystem • Seamless Integration • Premium Design

product_details.name: Apple Premium Device Bundle - MacBook Pro, iPad & iPhone Set
product_details.description:
• Complete Apple ecosystem: MacBook Pro, iPad, and iPhone for seamless integration
• MacBook Pro with Retina Display and backlit keyboard for premium computing experience
• High-performance Apple M-series chip for powerful processing
• iPad with stunning edge-to-edge display, perfect for creativity and productivity
• Latest iPhone model with advanced camera system and Face ID technology
• iCloud synchronization across all devices for seamless data access
• Premium aluminum build quality across all devices
• Latest iOS and macOS operating systems pre-installed
• Perfect bundle for professionals, creatives, and Apple enthusiasts
• Includes all essential Apple technologies: Touch ID, Retina displays, Force Touch trackpad
• Ideal for remote work, content creation, and multimedia consumption
• Compatible with all Apple services including iCloud, App Store, and Apple Arcade

banner_details:
The banner showcases a sleek and modern composition featuring a centered product display encased in a soft white circular frame. A bold heading (id: "heading") in dark gray dominates the top, followed by a vibrant subheading (id: "subheading") in blue which emphasizes the theme. To the right of the product image (id: "product_image"), a bright blue circular badge presents the price (id: "price") in white. At the bottom, a trio of feature points is presented as a tagline (id: "tagline"), continuing the clean symmetry. A vibrant call-to-action button (id: "cta") in solid blue anchors the banner with high visibility.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Gray Gradient: `#E5E5E5 → #F8F8F8`
- Accent Gradient: `#007AFF → #5AC8FA`
- Text Dark Gray: `#333333`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Highlight Blue (CTA & Subtext): `#007AFF`
product_color: The product image features a harmonious blend of sleek and modern design with natural tranquility. The color palette includes soft silver-gray (#C0C0C0) from the devices' aluminum bodies, complemented by deep black (#1C1C1C) from the keyboards and screens, enhancing contrast and clarity. The laptop screen displays a serene landscape with warm pinks (#E49B9B), lavender hues (#C3A9D9), and muted browns (#A26F4D), all subtly blended to create a peaceful visual experience. These tones contrast beautifully with the vivid blues (#204E7B) of the tablet’s earth view. This mix of tech-inspired grayscale with nature’s color tones creates a premium, calming palette perfect for advertisement banners.
